# VirtualScroller.getOffset() method

Get pixel offset by item index;

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOffset(index: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | item index |

**Returns:**

number

pixel offset

## Remarks

Time complexity: `O(log2(itemCount))`
